document_data.mainbody:
he First Age of Shou Lung was a period of ancient history in Kara-Tur in the 2 and 3 millennia before Dale Reckoning. It was a time of empires and lesser states that were considered successors to Imaskar and precursors to Shou Lung.
The First Age was determined by scholars to commence with the founding of the empire of Anok-Imaskar in .
